import React, { useEffect, useState } from 'react'; import { useParams } from 'react-router-dom'; import axios from 'axios'; import Header from '../components/Header'; import Footer from '../components/Footer'; import ImageSlide from './ImageSlider'; // Assuming you have an ImageSlider component const PlaceDetails = () => { const { id } = useParams(); // Get the place ID from the URL parameters const [placeDetails, setPlaceDetails] = useState(null); const defaultImage = '/img/unnamed.jpg'; useEffect(() => { const fetchPlaceDetails = async () => { try { //console.log(`Fetching details for place ID: ${id}`); const response = await fetch(`/PlaceDetails/${id}`); //console.log(`Response status: ${response.status}`); if (!response.ok) { throw new Error('Network response was not ok'); } const data = await response.json(); //console.log('Fetched place details:', data); setPlaceDetails(data); } catch (error) { console.error('Error fetching place details:', error); } }; fetchPlaceDetails(); }, [id]); return (
  • Overview
  • Prices
  • Location
  • Amenities
  • Reviews ({placeDetails.reviewsCount})

Description

{placeDetails.description}

{/* Section location */}

Location

{/* Google map */}
  • {placeDetails.location.address}
  • {placeDetails.location.phone}

Opening Hours

{placeDetails.openingHours.weekday_text.length > 0 ? (
    {placeDetails.openingHours.weekday_text.map((day, index) => (
  • {day}
    • ))}
) : (

No opening hours available

)}

Types

{finalTags.map((tag, index) => ( {tag} ))}
{/* Section amenities */}

Convenience

Accessibility
    {placeDetails.convenience.accessibility.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
Amenities
    {placeDetails.convenience.amenities.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
Children
    {placeDetails.convenience.children.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
Pets
    {placeDetails.convenience.pets.map((item, index) => (
  • {item}
    • ))}
{/* Section reviews */}

Reviews travellers

{review.userName}

))}

); }; export default PlaceDetails;
